text: int main ( ) { int t , l , i , j , sum , a [ 10 ] [ 10 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; i = 1 ; while ( i <= l ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; i = i + 1 ; } for ( i = 1 ; i <= l ; i ++ ) sum = sum + ( ( a [ i ] [ 1 ] > a [ i ] [ 2 ] ) ? a [ i ] [ 1 ] : a [ i ] [ 2 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
